name: Drone Onsite Physical Inspection Checklist
description: Optimized onsite physical inspection checklist with grouped tasks for efficiency

metadata.author: RemoteTI
metadata.safetyNote: IMPORTANT: ENSURE OVERALL SAFETY AND ACCURACY - This checklist is critical for safe drone operation

general: Safety First - This checklist is critical for the safe operation of the drone. Proper execution is essential.
Just Culture - We promote an environment of open and honest communication. Report any mistakes, incidents, or safety concerns without fear of blame.
Attention to Detail - Carefully follow each task in the order presented. Do not skip any steps.
Use PPE - Always wear required safety gear.
Report Issues - Document any abnormalities or safety concerns immediately.
INSTRUCTION: KEEP THE DRONE POWERED ON UNTIL A TASK THAT EXPLICITLY TELLS YOU TO TURN IT OFF.

tasks.title: SAFETY BRIEFING: Review critical safety requirements
tasks.description:
Safety First - This checklist is critical for safe drone operation.

Just Culture - Report any mistakes or concerns without fear of blame.
Attention to Detail - Follow each task in order. Do not skip steps.
Use PPE - Always wear required safety gear.
Report Issues - Document any abnormalities immediately.

KEEP THE DRONE POWERED ON until explicitly told to turn it off.
instructions: Read and understand all safety requirements.
Confirm PPE is available and worn.

tasks.title: PRS: Disarm the parachute system safely
tasks.description:
ALWAYS WEAR SAFETY GOGGLES AND HEARING PROTECTION WHEN HANDLING THE PRS FUSE.

Switch the parachute fuse just below the PRS tube to "SAFE".
instructions: Put on safety goggles and hearing protection.
Locate PRS fuse below the PRS tube.
Verify switch is secure in SAFE position.

tasks.title: ARRIVAL TASKS: Battery check and drone preparation
tasks.description:
Complete initial arrival tasks.

Verify spare batteries are fully charged (otherwise start charging).
Dry off any water, snow, or moisture on drone to prevent water entering during battery change.
instructions: Check spare batteries are fully charged.
Start charging if batteries not ready.
Dry off any moisture on drone.

tasks.title: SYSTEM: Initiate telemetry transfer
tasks.description: Connect the Ethernet cable and initiate telemetry data transfer from the drone.
instructions: Verify nav lights blinking yellow (transfer active).
Note: Continue checklist, will verify completion later.

tasks.title: PARACHUTE SYSTEM: Complete system inspection
tasks.description:
Inspect entire parachute system for integrity.

YELLOW LID: Check for cracks, verify evenly pressed, no fabric protruding.
TUBE: Verify securely mounted and fully seated, no structural damage.
LINE & COLLECTOR: Line collector intact, no excessive slack, line retained in backpack.
FUSE SWITCH: Structurally intact with red cap mounted.
instructions: Inspect yellow lid for cracks and proper seating.
Verify no parachute fabric visible outside lid.
Check tube is secure and undamaged.
Verify line collector intact with proper tension.
Check fuse switch intact with red cap.

tasks.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Comprehensive structural inspection
tasks.description:
Inspect all structural components.

MOTOR ARMS: Check for visual or structural damage.
CORE: Inspect for visual cracks.
LANDING GEAR: Check for cracks, verify connection (some play acceptable).
instructions: Inspect all motor arms for damage.
Confirm no excessive play in connections.

tasks.title: PROPULSION SYSTEM: Full propulsion inspection
tasks.description:
Complete propulsion system check.

PROPELLERS: Clean if needed, check for damage/cracks, inspect edges.
MOTORS: Check rotors, spin for smoothness, verify no abnormal sounds, check orange ESC cables.
AXIAL PLAY: Hold motor base, push/pull bell - no movement allowed.
ESCs: Verify no indications of loose mounting.
instructions: Spin each motor for smooth movement.
Check orange cables between ESC and motors.
Test each motor for axial play.

tasks.title: PERIPHERALS: All sensors and external components
tasks.description:
Inspect all peripheral systems.

4G ANTENNAS: Firmly mounted, 2 to sides, 2 angled down.
GPS MASTS: Structurally OK, both aimed forward.
REALSENSE: Front and downward lenses clean, no damage (use dry utilities only).
OPTICALFLOW: Clean, no dirt obscuring view.
DOWNLIGHT: Structurally intact on front right landing gear.
MINIFINDER: Mounted and holder intact.
instructions: Verify 4G antennas firmly mounted and positioned.
Check GPS masts structure and forward aim.
Clean RealSense lenses with dry utilities.
Verify Downlight intact on front right gear.

tasks.title: MARKING: Verify all required markings
tasks.description:
Verify drone and AED markings.

Permit number on rear arm (starting with "SWEbneâ€¦").
Onyx name and airframeID visible (e.g., "E3001" airframeID 1234C01B1124E3001).
Public instructions between middle and rear arms.
AED alarm device has power-off sticker.
instructions: Check permit number on rear arm.

tasks.title: SYSTEM: Complete telemetry and secure ports
tasks.description:
Finalize telemetry transfer and secure ports.

Confirm telemetry complete (nav lights not yellow).
If not complete after 10 minutes, stop and continue.
Remove Ethernet cable and store safely.
Securely lock Ethernet port cap.
Verify USB cap is also screwed on and sealed.
instructions: Check nav lights no longer yellow.
If still yellow after 10 min, stop transfer.
Screw on Ethernet port cap completely.

tasks.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Open lids for battery access
tasks.description:
Open drone compartment for battery replacement.

Unscrew 4 screws holding the lids together.
Open lids to access battery compartment.
instructions: Open lids carefully for battery access.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Verify new batteries ready
tasks.description:
Check new batteries are fully charged and undamaged.

Verify both batteries are over 50.3V.
Ensure batteries and connectors are undamaged.
Confirm batteries are clean and dry.
instructions: Verify both new batteries are over 50.3V.
Ensure batteries are clean and dry.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Remove and inspect old batteries
tasks.description: Safely remove and inspect the old batteries from the drone.
instructions: Unplug both batteries with unplugging tool.
Check for any swelling or damage.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Put old batteries on charge
tasks.description:
Connect old batteries to charging station.

Follow the instructions at the charging station.
Ensure batteries are properly connected to charger.
instructions: Follow instructions at the charging station.

tasks.title: INSTRUCTION: Align the drone perfectly
tasks.description: Position the drone precisely on the visual navigation marker for proper alignment.
instructions: Align drone over visual navigation marker.
Place front landing gear on the two dots in front of marker.
Ensure front camera faces correct direction.
Verify drone body perfectly aligned with visual navigation markers.

tasks.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Verify internal compartment
tasks.description: Inspect the internal battery compartment for cables, debris, and moisture.

tasks.title: LIVEVIEW: Verify camera condition
tasks.description: Inspect the LiveView camera for structural integrity and clean the lens.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Install odd number battery to front
tasks.description: Install the odd-numbered battery in the front position of the drone.
instructions: Place odd battery in front position.

tasks.title: SYSTEM STARTUP: Verify all systems initialize correctly
tasks.description:
Confirm proper system initialization after first battery connection.

LIVEVIEW: Camera moves to end position then returns forward.
FLIGHT CONTROLLER: Initial beeping for 5-10s, then stops if untouched.
NAV LIGHTS: Snake pattern - Green (OK), Blue (OK with MedKit), other = contact pilot.
ONYX FAN: Verify fan on bottom spins (keep fingers clear).
instructions: Listen for flight controller beeping pattern.
Contact pilot if unexpected nav lights.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Install even number battery to rear
tasks.description: Install the even-numbered battery in the rear position of the drone.
instructions: Place even battery in rear position.

tasks.title: POWER SYSTEM: Inspect umbilical contact surfaces
tasks.description:
Check umbilical for damage before connecting.

Inspect copper surfaces on umbilical (floor and drone landing gear).
Ensure no soot or residues from sparks.
Verify copper pins/pads are not bent or damaged.

tasks.title: POWER SYSTEM: Attach umbilical to drone
tasks.description:
Connect umbilical for power supply.

Connect umbilical next to the left landing gear.
Confirm connector is straight and fully connected.
instructions: Connect umbilical to left landing gear.

tasks.title: DOCUMENTATION: Note inspection details in work order
tasks.description: Document the inspection details in the work order system.
instructions: Enter name, AirframeID, drone name, battery set.

tasks.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Close the lids
tasks.description: Close and secure the battery compartment lids.

tasks.title: MEDKIT: Verify contents and AED status
tasks.description:
Verify MedKit contents and AED operational status.

Verify all utilities are included and in good condition.
Check AED is correctly placed inside MedKit.
Confirm AED status is OK.
Verify AED is dry, clean and free from damage.
instructions: Check AED is clean and undamaged.

tasks.title: WINCH: Thread and attach line
tasks.description:
Set up winch line for MedKit deployment.

Thread line through the red guide below drone.
Attach line securely to the spool.
Roll up line using button on winch housing.
Confirm spool spins smoothly with no abnormal noise.
instructions: Press and hold button to roll up line.

tasks.title: MEDKIT: Mount and secure MedKit
tasks.description: Mount the MedKit in position and secure it with the locking mechanism.
instructions: Attach magnetic connector to front right.

tasks.title: SKYBASE: Complete environment and maintenance check
tasks.description:
Final Skybase inspection and maintenance.

VISUAL MARKERS: Clean navigation markers.
VEGETATION: No overgrown foliage/grass.
CLEAN & SAFE: Secure tools, remove debris.
LIGHTS: Interior and external lights working.
RESTOCK: Note any items needing restocking.
CAMERAS: Clean all 8 dome cameras with microfiber.

tasks.title: FINAL CHECK: Verify everything is ready
tasks.description:
Final verification before arming PRS.

Ensure Ethernet port cap is screwed on.
Confirm drone is perfectly aligned.
Confirm lids are securely screwed on.
Verify all tools are secured.

tasks.title: PRS: Arm the parachute system safely
tasks.description:
FINAL CRITICAL STEP - ARM PARACHUTE

ALWAYS WEAR SAFETY GOGGLES AND HEARING PROTECTION.
Switch the parachute fuse below PRS tube to "DANGER".
After arming the PRS, DO NOT approach the drone.
instructions: Put on safety goggles and hearing protection.

tasks.title: DOCUMENTATION: Report any abnormalities
tasks.description:
Record any issues found during inspection.

Fill out Adverse Events form for any abnormalities.
Link: https://forms.gle/NF1nVe6F9GGWq5fZ8
instructions: If any issues found, open Adverse Events form.
